Author: Tichy
Content:
"Inspired by a childhood passion for paper dolls, Scandinavian born Liisa started drawing dolls and accompanying wardrobes, uploading them to Geocities. The personal page grew, evolving to Paperdoll Heaven in 2004."

Sounds as if the original founder WAS designing a product she needed herself. Personally I don't see how I could ever have turned a virtual doll-clothing venture into a success.

Author: sabat
Content:
Interesting -- I just checked out what Amazon does, as a reference. Amazon uses email as the login. If you change your email address (and can't get into the old one), AND you forgot your password, you are SOL: you have to open a new account.

I guess that's the "lots of pain" part, but I don't blame them.
